articles.author: Angel Shaw
articles.title: 10 Most Exciting Things To Expect From Gladiator 2
articles.description: Gladiator 2 will bring fans back to Ancient Rome for another brutal adventure, with several new and nostalgic elements ready to keep us "entertained."
articles.content:
Summary
  • Gladiator 2 brings a brand new gladiator, Lucius, who steps aside from his role as heir to follow in Maximus' footsteps. Paul Mescal is a perfect fit for the role.

articles.author: Clark Collis
articles.title: Nicolas Cage may retire from movies after '3 or 4 more'
articles.description: Nicolas Cage is threatening to stop appearing in movies after just a handful more films.
articles.content: Nicolas Cage is a famously prolific actor who this year alone has been seen in more than a half dozen movies including the vampire comedy Renfield, the horror-thriller Sympathy for the Devil, the sup… [+2538 chars]
